Entries.Wilford: Is this for me?.. Really? Thanks a lot./651 636 376 608/Thank you, @. I like it./721 614 815 563 248 604 -80 727/Try again, @. You might get lucky./305 575 131 206 216 260 306 346 349 395 398 399 66/Faugh, yuck.. You should be ashamed of yourself!/729 537 245 220 221 167 233 424 149 798 168 -20/I'll accept it./-18 -14 -5 -6 -26 -27 -81/

Entries.Wilford0: I wish I could go back in time and pass on to myself: 'Hey, man, you'll be happy soon!'$1
Entries.Wilford1: Haha, are you still up for it?$8#$e#I'm talking about our wedding.$1

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Wilford in the bonds of marriage. Let us celebrate that on this day, {0} of {1}, two different beings from two very different places are united in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#Let us celebrate that on this day, {0} of {1}, two different beings from two very different places are united in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Wilford... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Wilford... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and..., well, husband!$h

Entries.companionAccepted: Well, it's time to stretch my legs.$1
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Ah, my buttercup, do you want to spend time together? I'm simply happy.$8
Entries.companionRejected: Sorry, I'm just swamped with work today.$2
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Hey, it's been a really long day.$2#$b#Even if I wanted to go with you, I don't think I'd have the energy.$10
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Honey, it's too late to go anywhere.#$b#We can have a good time in bed.$7
Entries.companionDismiss: Hey, we make a pretty good team.$7#$b#Let me know if you want to do it again.$1
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: We had a great time!$1#$b#Well, then we'll meet at home, won't we?
Entries.companionDismissAuto: My feeble body wasn't meant for such long adventures after all.$2#$b#I think I should take a break and have a cup of herbal tea to regain my strength.
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Oh, my feet... I'm completely exhausted.$2#$b#I'll be waiting for you at home, okay?
Entries.companionRecruited: So, what's our plan?#$b#Tell me beforehand, so I can at least prepare mentally.$2
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: With you I'm ready for anything.$1#I wonder what we're going to do today?$1
Entries.companion_Farm: There's nothing more satisfying than watching happy plants. You take good care of them, @.$1
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: Thanks to our joint efforts, this farm will bloom like the most beautiful flower!$8
Entries.companion_Mine: This place looks intimidating, but I'm not backing down.
Entries.companion_Mine_Spouse: Don't be afraid, I'll be there for you.$1
Entries.companion_Forest: Well, you picked a great place to walk together.$1#$b#It's literally my second home.$7
Entries.companion_Forest_Spouse: I couldn't imagine a better place to spend time together!$8
Entries.companion_Town_Night: The empty streets at night create quite an intimate atmosphere, don't you think?
Entries.companion_Town_spring: Give me a minute. It's so nice in here.$7
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: What a weather! I should have brought an umbrella.$2
Entries.companion_Mountain: Mountain air is good for your lungs.
Entries.companion_Beach_summer: Perhaps I should collect some shells for my crafts.
Entries.companion_Beach: It's nice here.$1#$b#Just don't splash me, okay?
Entries.companion_Saloon: Hey, we're not going to be here long, are we?$6
Entries.giveForages: @, I think you'll find it useful.
Entries.heal: Where does it hurt? Here we go.$10
Entries.nomedkits: All my medications are out! We have to be careful.$2

Entries.ambient_Town_Wilford~1: I don't want to talk to anyone.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Wilford~1: We got a little closer to the sky.
Entries.ambient_Backwoods_Wilford~1: I hope we won't get lost.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Wilford~1: Do you want to take a swim?
Entries.ambient_Beach_Wilford~3: I don't like the smell of fish.
Entries.ambient_Woods_Wilford~1: I have so much work to do at home...
Entries.ambient_Sewer_Wilford~1: I think I stepped into something.
Entries.ambient_Sewer_Wilford~2: What are you looking for in here?
Entries.ambient_BugLand_Wilford~1: This place will give me nightmares.
Entries.ambient_WitchSwamp_Wilford: This place gives me the creeps.

Entries.WilfordHouse.1: The fridge is empty. You wonder when was the last time food was stored here.
Entries.WilfordHouse.2: Trough the dim glass you can see a beautiful flower greenhouse.
Entries.WilfordHouse.3: Wilford must spend most of his time tending the plants.
Entries.WilfordHouse.4: Scented candles «Floral and herbaceous geranium with bergamot and a hint of lavender»
Entries.WilfordHouse.5: The pie was probably prepared in case unexpected guests' visit.
Entries.WilfordHouse.6: «Encyclopaedic dictionary of medicinal and poisonous plants»
Entries.WilfordHouse.7: Between pages of one of the books you find dried flower petals. To the touch, they are soft and fragile, like wings of a summer butterfly.
Entries.WilfordHouse.8: «Dr. Harvey... a prescription for a medication  entitlement... constant fatigue and apathy... stress-related... contraindications...» You put the document aside.
Entries.WilfordHouse.9: Dried flower buds and fruits are sorted into baskets. You inhale deeply the sweet aroma.
Entries.WilfordHouse.10: Garden tools covered with a layer of fresh earth.
Entries.WilfordHouse.11: Apparently, Wilford is using this for his work.
Entries.WilfordHouse.12: The workbook is full of tiny text - you can't make it out.
Entries.WilfordHouse.13: This sculpture looks familiar to you.
Entries.WilfordHouseEx.1: The flowerbeds look well tended. Little green sprouts peep out of the loose soil.
Entries.WilfordHouse.14: Among the scraps of torn paper and crumpled envelopes, you notice a photo of an unknown girl. Her fiery curls look mesmerizing.
Entries.SableRoomClosed: The ladder leads to the attic.

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Wilford: Want to see a film with me? I'm fine with that.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I actually like watching movies.$1#$b#But it's not so much fun to do it alone.#$e#So I'm glad you've invited me.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Okay, that wasn't bad. I guess I even liked it.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: This looks interesting!$1#$b#I would love to learn more about the landscapes around us..

AfterMovie.Text: Yeah, that was good.$7#$b#I'll be sure to review it later.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Um. Do you think I like that?$9#$b#Okaay, but don't look at me with those eyes.

DuringMovie.Script: /message "A tear ran down Wilford's cheek. You chuckle softly."

BeforeMovie.Text: I like this atmosphere. Let's watch it.$1

AfterMovie.Text: What do you think of the film? For me, it's very heartwarming.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope the movie will be entertaining.

AfterMovie.Text: This was such a good idea. Thank you, @.$7
Well, that was interesting.#$b#Still, I'm pleased with your attention.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm already bored, to be honest.$2

DuringMovie.Script: /shake Wilford 1000/pause 500/message "You seem to have woken him up.."

AfterMovie.Text: At least I got some sleep.$7#$b#But thanks anyway.

Entries.Wilford: Am I the only one who finds all these games a bit strange?$6#$e#Crawling on dirty earth in search of these...colorful balls.#$b#Doubtful pleasure.$9
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: There you are.$8#$e#Are you going to collect all these eggs again?$12#$b#You're unstoppable.$8#$b#But first, get a look at the festive table.#$e#Сan take my portion, you know my attitude to sweets.$9

Entries.Wilford: How do you like the design of the dance floor?$1#$b#I've put a lot of time and energy into each decoration.
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: How do you like all these decorations, huh?$19#$e#You are my most beautiful flower among all.$8#$e#..Do you want to dance?$1#$b#I'm not very comfortable doing it here...$9#$e#But wait, are you going to invite someone else?$6#$b#In that case, I'll dance with you, okay.$7

Entries.Wilford: I added in soup violet petals and a sprig of rosemary for flavor.$1
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: Hey, my buttercup.$1#$b#Come here. *hugs*$8#$e#I think the Governor will appreciate our floral seasonings.$1

Entries.Wilford: Jellyfish remind me of crystal rose buds.$1#$b#Such an incredible sight.$8
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: Good evening, my poppy seed.$8#$e#%You stand in front of Wilford on the edge of the pier, letting his arms wrap around your shoulders.^%You stand in front of Wilford on the edge of the pier, letting his arms wrap around your waist.

Entries.Wilford: All this turmoil reminds me of life in a big city..$2#$e#Have you talked to..Ras..Rasmodius..and his friends?$10#$b#Linus told me about them...some things.$9
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: Have you already collected your grange display?#$b#Well, then...all the best!$8

Entries.Wilford: I truly enjoy this night.$1#$b#Such a magical atmosphere, isn't it?$8#$e#Have you already visited the maze?
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: Maybe we'll watch some horror movie after the festival?$1#$b#I've never felt less like sleep in my life!$8
Are you cold?$1#$e#We can have a snowball fight to warm up.$8

Entries.Wilford: Such a good day.$1#$e#Everyone around is smiling and laughing.$1#$b#It's warm and cosy here despite the cold. Haha.$8
Entries.Wilford_Spouse: Look how happy everyone is.$8#$e#Hey, honey, just give me a smile.$1#$e#..Are you trembling?$10#$b#Wait, I'll bring you a blanket.

Entries.9876393/f Wilford 250/t 1600 2100/z summ: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 9 2 Wilford 10 20 0 Gus 10 18 2 Linus 1 10 2/viewport 11 18 true/skippable/pause 3500/speak Gus "..Alright.#$b#Here you go."/pause 1500/speak Gus "Something too much for one person comes out.$1#$b#Are you sure you can handle it?"/pause 1250/speak Wilford "Haha.$8#$b#I'm really starving.$1"/pause 1250/speak Gus "Well then, have a nice evening.$1"/pause 1250/emote Wilford 32/pause 1250/move Wilford 2 0 1/move Wilford 0 1 2/move Wilford 2 0 1/move Wilford 0 3 2/playSound doorClose/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/stopMusic/changeLocation Town/viewport 45 72 true/pause 3000/warp Wilford 45 71 2/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 28 72 1/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Мhmm..$8"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 20/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 1 2/move Wilford 4 0 1/move Wilford 0 -9 0/speed farmer 1/move farmer 21 0 1/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/changeLocation Mountain/pause 500/warp Wilford 17 9 1/warp farmer 12 10 1/playMusic Plums/viewport 29 9 true/move Wilford 10 0 1/faceDirection 0 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wilford "Hey? Anyone home?"/pause 3750/warp Linus 29 7 2/pause 1750/move Linus 0 1 2/move Linus 1 0 1/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/move Linus 0 1 3/pause 1500/speak Linus "Here you are.#$b#I was waiting for you.$1"/pause 1000/move Wilford 1 0 1/pause 750/speak Wilford "How you doing?$1"/pause 750/speak Wilford "Warm days are over now..$9#$b#It's getting cold."/pause 1000/speak Linus "I have a bonfire and a balmy blanket in the tent.$1#$b#Winter days don't scare me. On especially frosty ones I usually stay overnight in the mine.$1#$b#So you've nothing to worry about."/pause 1000/emote Wilford 28/pause 1750/speak Wilford "..Well, I brought you something."/pause 750/speak Wilford "On the way, I was going by saloon and took a few servings of fresh fish stew.#$b#Just like you like.$1"/pause 500/emote Linus 16/jump Linus 8/pause 750/speak Linus "That's what I call a true friend!!$3#$b#Thank you so much.$1"/pause 1000/emote Linus 32/pause 1000/speak Linus "I haven't eaten such meal for a long time.#$b#..Warm and hearty.$1"/move farmer 13 0 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 3/pause 500/emote Wilford 8/pause 1000/speak Wilford "..Wha..what brought you here?$6"/pause 500/speak Wilford "You're not welcome here.$7"/pause 750/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Linus "Wilford."/pause 250/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/pause 1000/speak Linus "@ is probably hungry - all day on his feet.^@ is probably hungry - all day on her feet.#$b#Treat him too.$1^Treat her too.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "Be kind to a stranger just as you were kind to me."/pause 1000/shake Wilford 1000/pause 2250/move Wilford -1 0 3/move Wilford 0 1 2/move Wilford -1 0 3/pause 1250/speak Wilford "It's not me, it's Linus treating you now.$9#$b#So hold it steady and be thankful to him."/pause 750/move Wilford 1 0 3/pause 2000/farmerEat 728/pause 1500/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/emote Linus 32/pause 500/emote Wilford 12/pause 750/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 40/friendship Linus 25/end

"Please...$9#$b#...find...$9#$b#...Harvey...$10"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/changeLocation Hospital/warp Wilford 18 12/showFrame Wilford 28/warp farmer 22 10/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Harvey 20 12/faceDirection Harvey 3/viewport 15 9 true/playMusic distantBanjo/pause 4000/emote Harvey 28/pause 1500/faceDirection Harvey 1 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "He needs to rest."/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -6 0 3/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/move Harvey 2 0 1/move Harvey 0 -4 0/move Harvey -4 0 3/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/pause 500/speak Harvey "Thank you, @.#$b#If you hadn't found him, who knows how long he would have stayed there unconscious.$2"/pause 500/speak Harvey "His condition indicates that he hasn't eaten anything for a long time again.#$b#*sighs* I don't even know what to do.$2#$b#Sometimes I think he really needs some supervisor to make him eat."/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Harvey "In any case, thank you again.$1#$b#You can go back to your business, and I'll keep an eye on him."/pause 500/speak Harvey "I have some pumpkin pie left that he can't refuse.$1#$b#So I think he'll be fine by morning."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.9856393/f Wilford 500/t 900 1500: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Wilford 9 14 3 Harvey 10 6 2/viewport 10 13 true/skippable/pause 2000/emote Wilford 28/pause 2500/warp farmer 10 19/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 750/playMusic Ghost Synth/faceDirection Wilford 2 true/pause 500/emote Wilford 8/pause 1500/speak Wilford "Gosh, and what are you doing here?$6"/pause 750/speak Wilford "Never mind.$7"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 40/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I looked at the overall patient statistics...#$b#In general, things are not going well.$9"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Some residents of valley have certain problems with their oral cavity...$10"/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...Should I let Harvey know about it?$10#$b#I can offer additional personal consultations.$9"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "But wouldn't this gesture seem tactless on my part...?$10"/pause 750/question fork0 "#It's really very important... But I don't think you should go to Harvey about it. The doctor already knows the condition of his patients. It sounds more like criticism than advice.#That sounds serious. I think you should discuss this problem with Harvey. He sure could use the extra hands."/fork 9856393_Yes/pause 1000/speak Wilford "You think so?"/pause 500/speak Wilford "Then that’s what I will do.$1#$b#It will be nice to remember the old days and feel the cold metal of the tools in my hands again."/pause 750/move Harvey 0 6 2/doAction 10 13/playSound doorClose/move Harvey 0 2 2/move Harvey 2 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Wilford 1/pause 2000/speak Wilford "Ahem... Harvey?"/pause 1000/emote Harvey 8/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...What's the matter?"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 40/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I would like to discuss one issue with you...$9"/pause 1500/speak Harvey "Sure.$1#$b#Better come with me to my office.$1"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 60/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 40/end dialogue Wilford "..!$1#$e#...Harvey accepted the help!$1#$b#Nevertheless you were right.$8#$e#Thank you, @.$1"
Entries.9856393_Yes: pause 1000/speak Wilford "Hmm... okay.$10#$b#Even if you think so...$9"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I'll keep my thoughts to myself."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford -50/end dialogue Wilford "...Why do I still feel like I missed my chance?$2#$e#Okay, that would be too stupid."

Entries.9846393/f Wilford 1000/t 600 1300/w sunn: kindadumbautumn/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 64 2 Wilford 14 72 2/makeInvisible 13 68 20 76/ignoreCollisions Wilford/ignoreCollisions farmer/viewport 15 72 true/skippable/animate Wilford false true 1000 20 21 22 23 22 21/pause 4000/emote Wilford 32 true/pause 3000/move farmer 0 8 0/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 2000/stopAnimation Wilford/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wilford "..Hmm?"/pause 2000/speak Wilford "...@.#$b#What are you doing in here?"/pause 1000/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 500/question fork0 "#Running about my farming business.#I have the same question."/fork 9846393_Flovers/switchEvent 9846393_Flovers
Entries.9846393_Flovers: pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 3/pause 1250/speak Wilford "I'm replenishing the stock of materials..."/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 1/pause 1250/speak Wilford "..Erm.#$b#Of flowers.$1"/pause 3000/playMusic sadpiano/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 2000/showFrame Wilford 16/pause 2500/emote Wilford 12/pause 2000/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Wilford "Hey...$9#$b#Don't you ever feel like an outsider here?$10"/pause 750/speak Wilford "I mean... You used to live in the city, too.$9#$b#I don't know if it seems to me...$10"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "The way the locals look at me.$10#$b#It feels to me like in all this time we haven't been able to find common ground.$2"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Forest is the only place I do feel safe and calm.$0#$b#Being with nature dulls my pangs of loneliness for a while.$7"/pause 2000/speak Wilford "Oh. Sorry.$1"/speak Wilford "I have so many thoughts, that I'm ready to bare my soul in front of the... accidental stranger.$9"/pause 2000/quickQuestion #Try to communicate more with people and be less aggressive.#You should make friends - there are a lot of interesting personalities in the valley.#Maybe Stardew Valley is not your place?(break)speak Wilford "Is this the first thing that crossed your mind?$6#$b#Come on.$7#$b#Don't think it's that simple."(break)speak Wilford "...Maybe you're right.#$b#But I don’t think that I'll succeed in becoming a worthy friend.$9"(break)speak Wilford "...$9#$b#And where is this 'my' place then?$6#$b#Think before you say something."/pause 2000/speak Wilford "..You can go now."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 750/textAboveHead Wilford "Wait."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 750/move Wilford 2 0 1/pause 750/speak Wilford "..."/pause 750/emote farmer 8/pause 1250/speak Wilford "...Here you go. [773]$9#$b#...I found this flask near that old tower.$9#$b#...You might find this helpful."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Wilford 60/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 10/end dialogue Wilford "...$9#$e#There was nothing between us in that forest... Okay?$10#$b#Let's just forget about it."

Entries.9846393/f Wilford 1000/t 700 1300/w sunn: kindadumbautumn/-1000 -1000/farmer 15 77 2 Wilford 8 85 2/viewport 15 85 true/skippable/animate Wilford false true 1000 20 21 22 23 22 21/pause 4000/emote Wilford 32 true/pause 3000/move farmer 0 8 0/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 2000/stopAnimation Wilford/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wilford "..Hmm?"/pause 2000/speak Wilford "..@.#$b#What are you doing in here?"/pause 1000/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 500/question whyHere "#Running about my farming business.#I have the same question."/fork 9846393_Flovers/switchEvent 9846393_Flovers
Entries.9846393_Flovers: pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 3/pause 1250/speak Wilford "I'm replenishing the stock of materials..."/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 1/pause 1250/speak Wilford "..Erm.#$b#Of flowers.$1"/pause 3000/playMusic sadpiano/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 2000/showFrame Wilford 16/pause 2500/emote Wilford 12/pause 2000/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Wilford "You know..$9#$b#Sometimes I feel superfluous.$10"/pause 750/speak Wilford "..Superfluous in any company. Room...$9#$b#In the whole world.$10"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "All these sideways glances and ridicule.$10#$b#For some reason, I take it too personally.$2"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Forest is the only place I do feel safe and calm.$0#$b#I like this nagging feeling of loneliness that gives me reunion with nature.$7"/pause 1750/speak Wilford "Oh. Sorry.$1#$b#I have so many thoughts, that I'm ready to bare my soul in front of the...accidental stranger.$9"/pause 1500/quickQuestion #Try to communicate more with people and be less aggressive.#You should make friends - there are a lot of interesting personalities in the city.#Maybe Stardew Valley is not your place?(break)speak Wilford "Is this the first thing that crossed your mind?$6#$b#Come on.$7#$b#Don't think that everything is so simple in this life."(break)speak Wilford "..Perhaps you're right.#$b#But I don’t think that I'll succeed in becoming a worthy friend.$9"(break)speak Wilford "...$9#$b#And then where is this 'my' place?$6#$b#Try not to say everything that pops into your brain."/pause 2000/speak Wilford "..You can go now."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 750/textAboveHead Wilford "Wait."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 750/move Wilford 2 0 1/pause 750/speak Wilford "..."/pause 750/emote farmer 8/pause 1250/speak Wilford "..Here you go. [773]$9#$b#..I found this flask near that old tower.$9#$b#..You might find this helpful."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Wilford 60/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 10/end dialogue Wilford "...$9#$e#There was nothing in that forest... Alright?$10#$b#Let's just put all this aside."

Entries.9866393/f Wilford 1500/e 9846393/t 1200: ocean/-1000 -1000/farmer 26 12 3 Wilford 9 12 3 Alex 38 17 2 Haley 39 17 2/viewport 15 12 true/skippable/pause 4000/emote Wilford 12/pause 2000/move farmer -9 0 3/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/move farmer -5 0 3/pause 2000/faceDirection Wilford 1/playMusic moonlightJellies/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I...$9"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I feel bad today.$10"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...No.$9#$b#Terrible.$10"/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 3/pause 1000/move farmer -1 0 3/warp Alex 30 12/warp Haley 33 12/speed Alex 3/move Alex -10 0 3/speed Haley 3/move Haley -12 0 0/move Haley 0 -1 0/move Haley -2 0 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/pause 500/speak Alex "Hey, what's up?$1"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/move Wilford 1 0 1/pause 750/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/speak Wilford "...Let's go."/pause 750/question fork0 "#Okay.#I'll stay here."/fork 9866393_Go/pause 1000/move Wilford -1 0 1/pause 1000/shake Wilford 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 500/speak Wilford "...$5"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I understood you.$7"/pause 750/move Wilford 2 0 2/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Bye.$2"/speed Wilford 3/move Wilford 22 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Alex 8/emote Haley 8/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford -500/end dialogue Wilford "%Wilford's ignoring you."
Entries.9866393_Go: pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound ocean/warp Wilford 85 39 1/warp farmer 88 39 3/viewport 87 39 true/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 0 2/pause 2000/showFrame Wilford 16/textAboveHead Wilford "*sighs*"/pause 2000/faceDirection Wilford 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 1 true/playMusic desolate/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Recently, I began to recall my past life more often."/pause 500/speak Wilford "For some reason, reappeared this unreasonable...$9#$b#...Longing.$10"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 2 true/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1000/shake Wilford 1000/showFrame Wilford 16/emote Wilford 12/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Before, when I lived in a big city, everything was completely different.$9#$b#I had a family, friends, and my life was quiet and calm."/pause 1000/speak Wilford "After graduation, I packed my things and, in search of new goals and opportunities, from the outskirts of the city moved directly to the center.$10"/pause 750/shake Wilford 1000/pause 1000/speak Wilford "The first month I shone with joy and couldn't believe my luck.$8#$b#Such a grownup and independent, one on one with 'limitless' opportunities, kindly provided by the capital."/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 0 true/pause 750/speak Wilford "...I was too naive.$7"/pause 750/speak Wilford "Trusted everyone and didn't know how to calculate my strength."/pause 1000/faceDirection Wilford 2 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/question fork0 "#And what happened then?#What are you doing in the valley then?"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 40/pause 1000/playMusic echos/speak Wilford "...I had my own clinic.#$b#Still can't believe it.$7"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I sacrificed a lot for my dream.#$b#I even sold all my clothes, moved out of the apartment...$9#$b#In the daytime I received clients, in the evening - dined and slept in the office."/pause 500/speak Wilford "I wasn't worried about comfort or my own well-being, the main was condition of the clinic and its visitors."/pause 1000/speak Wilford "And then..."/pause 500/emote Wilford 16/jump Wilford 8/shake Wilford 1000/pause 500/speak Wilford "...What time is it?$3#$b#...$7#$b#I have to go.$10"/pause 1000/move Wilford 0 -1 0/move Wilford 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 1000/speak Wilford "We'll continue next time, okay?"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speed Wilford 3/move Wilford 0 -10 0/faceDirection farmer 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 100/stopMusic/end dialogue Wilford "Hey, @.$1#$b#...$9#$b#I'm sorry that our dialogue ended so abruptly.#$e#And thanks for listening and accepting.#$b#Sometimes a stream of words breaks out of me, and all these thoughts and emotions...$9#$b#There's nowhere to put them.$10#$e#You can make any request, from this day I am your debtor.$1"

merciless.$8"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...?"/pause 500/speak Wilford "...Oh, of course."/pause 750/speak Wilford "You want to hear the end of the story...$9"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/speak Wilford "I think it would be better to move somewhere to a more... cosy place.$1"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Let's go to the library#Let's go to the saloon"/fork 17/pause 3000/speak Wilford "...$8"/pause 750/speak Wilford "It's so warm here...$7"/pause 500/speak Wilford "Mhmm...$8#$b#Do you smell it?$1"/pause 500/speak Wilford "Is it... a freshly baked pumpkin pie?$1#$b#I LOVE IT!$8"/pause 750/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Ahem.$9"/pause 600/speak Wilford "So what were we talking about...?"/pause 500/question fork0 "#You wanted to continue the story of your past life.#...About what?"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "Oh, sure.#$b#...The story.$9"/stopMusic/pause 750/speak Wilford "...$2"/pause 50/playMusic grandpas_theme/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...So as I said, things didn't go as planned.$9"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "I was barely scraping by, almost didn't eat and constantly worked.$9"/pause 750/speak Wilford "Instead of discussing the problem with my family, I turned to a bank of dubious reputation.#$b#I didn’t want to disturb anyone, haha."/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...$2#$b#Disgusting.#$b#Such an idiot..."/pause 1000/farmerEat 614/pause 3000/speak Wilford "As you already figured it out, I've put an unbearable burden on my shoulders."/pause 1000/emote Wilford 12/pause 1250/speak Wilford "These bouncers in black, they... chased me everywhere.$10"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "The amount was too large, I didn't meet the deadlines, and in the end I turned for help to my uncle and aunt...$9"/stopMusic/playMusic grandpas_theme/pause 2000/speak Wilford "Everything worked out.$7#$b#But I am still ashamed of the stupidity, cowardice and weakness that I showed then."/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...To be honest, I'm still scared.$10#$b#A feeling of acute anxiety does not leave me.$10#$b#I am in constant debt, you know?"/playMusic grandpas_theme/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...I had to sell the clinic.$9#$b#I apologized to my family and... moved here.$9#$b#Or should I say... escaped?$10#$b#Anyway, it doesn't matter now.$7"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #You should stop being afraid and just live on.#How can I help?#It's not your fault, you just had no choice#Everyone makes mistakes, it's not too late to change everything(break)speak Wilford "Haha, do you really think everything is so simple?#$b#This naivety...$9"(break)speak Wilford "You've already helped just by listening.$1"(break)speak Wilford "...Did you even listen to me?$6#$b#Never mind.$7"(break)speak Wilford "I guess you're right.#$b#I still have a chance to get better!$1"/pause 2000/speak Wilford "...$9#$b#Now I'm relieved.$7#$b#Thank you, @.$1"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...Why don't we change the subject, all right?$1"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "%farm farm.#$b#Tell me a little about it and your life in general.$8"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 10/end

woodsTheme/pause 500/speak Wilford "Good evening.$1"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...I'm glad to see you here.$1"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 40/pause 1500/speak Wilford "Well... have a seat.$1"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/warp farmer 20 17 0/faceDirection farmer 0 true/showFrame farmer 62/pause 200/move Wilford 2 0 1/move Wilford 0 -3 0/move Wilford 1 0 1/move Wilford 0 -2 0/move Wilford -1 0 3/move Wilford 0 -1 0/move Wilford -3 0 2/faceDirection Wilford 2 true/pause 500/quickQuestion #Did you do all this by yourself?(break)pause 500/emote Wilford 60/pause 1500/speak Wilford "Actually, it wasn't that hard.#$b#I love to take care of the people that are dear to me...$1"/pause 200/speak Wilford "Ahem.$4"/pause 1000/speak Wilford "You understand why I invited you here, don't you?"/pause 500/quickQuestion #Yes#No(break)speak Wilford "Really?$4#$b#Then that makes it all easier.$1"(break)speak Wilford "Well, I thought so...$2"/pause 1000/emote Wilford 40/pause 1500/speak Wilford "I began to notice that we had become very close recently.$1#$b#It's usually hard for me to open up to strangers, but it's different with you, you know?"/pause 500/speak Wilford "I was thinking for a long time and could not find the reason for my strange feelings..."/pause 500/speak Wilford "But now I realized.$1"/pause 500/speak Wilford "I feel something much deeper and stronger for you than mere friendship, @.$4"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#These feelings are mutual!#Sorry, but I don't share your feelings."/fork accept/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Wilford "...Oh.$10"/pause 500/speak Wilford "Я... understand.$9"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford -1000/end

Entries.accept: pause 500/jump Wilford 8/pause 500/speak Wilford "...I'm so happy!$8"/pause 500/speak Wilford "Well, that sounds like a toast.$1#$b#Cheers!$8"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/emote Wilford 20/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
